thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 22 of 539
thread.title: Amy

author: Amy
title: Amy
text: My daughter wanted a simple but elegant dress for prom, and choose this one. She loves it, and says it's very comfortable. She is a size 8 and we ordered a large. It barely zips all the way up. It's definitely made small like all prom dresses. She is around 5' 5 and with 2inch heels it's still a little long. Also the zipper keeps getting stuck. Over all we are happy with the purchase.
